---
id: get-assets-by-type-and-location
title: "Get assets by type and location"
description: "Retrieves assets filtered by both type and location. Use this for targeted inventory views (for example, all Chromebooks at a specific campus) without building a full filter payload."
sidebar_label: "Get assets by type and location"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/api/assets/assets-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get assets by type and location"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/of/{assetTypeId}/at/{locationId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves assets filtered by both type and location. Use this for targeted inventory views (for example, all Chromebooks at a specific campus) without building a full filter payload.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetTypeId** - Obtain from [GET /api/v1.0/assets/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-types).
2. **locationId** - Obtain from [GET /api/v2.0/locations/view](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-view-v-2).

**Workflow Example**
1. List asset types and select the target type.
2. List locations and select the target location.
3. [GET /api/v1.0/assets/of/\{assetTypeId\}/at/\{locationId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-assets-by-type-and-location) with optional paging.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetTypeId`, `locationId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset type","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"locationId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the location (optional)","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"$p","in":"query","description":"Zero-based page index","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0}},{"name":"$s","in":"query","description":"Page size","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
